name: protomaps-themes-base
description: Protomaps basemap themes for MapLibre GL JS

scripts.dist-light: mkdir -p dist/layers && npm run --silent generate-layers protomaps light en Latin > dist/layers/light.json
scripts.dist-dark: mkdir -p dist/layers && npm run --silent generate-layers protomaps dark en Latin > dist/layers/dark.json
scripts.dist-white: mkdir -p dist/layers && npm run --silent generate-layers protomaps white en Latin > dist/layers/white.json
scripts.dist-grayscale: mkdir -p dist/layers && npm run --silent generate-layers protomaps grayscale en Latin > dist/layers/grayscale.json
scripts.dist-black: mkdir -p dist/layers && npm run --silent generate-layers protomaps black en Latin > dist/layers/black.json
scripts.dist-all: npm run dist-light && npm run dist-dark && npm run dist-white && npm run dist-grayscale && npm run dist-black

author: The Protomaps Authors
